channel.title: current affairs on QuizInk - The e-magazine
channel.description: Recent content in current affairs on QuizInk - The e-magazine

item.title: Should we all be using Signal?
item.description: “There are two types of encryption: one that will prevent your sister from reading your diary and one that will prevent your government.” -Bruce Schneier”

item.title: Planned Obsolescence and the Batterygate Lawsuit
item.description: “From cell phones to household appliances and clothing to automobile tires, some products we use every day could last much longer. But they don’t."
